sentences.en: Campaigners lit scores of bonfires in ceremonies to mark the anniversary.
sentences.cn: 参加运动的人们在各种仪式上点起一垛垛篝火以纪念周年庆典。

sentences.en: Even in Zurich he kept up with the County cricket scores.
sentences.cn: 即使身在苏黎世，他也一直关注着郡际板球赛的比分。

sentences.en: He had mentored scores of younger doctors.
sentences.cn: 他指导过许多更年轻的医生。

sentences.en: He scored late in the third quarter to cut the gap to 10 points.
sentences.cn: 他在第3节快结束时进了一球，把分差缩小到10分。

sentences.en: He scores goals with remark-able consistency.
His goal leveled the scores of the two teams.
sentences.cn: 他的进球把两队的得分拉平了.

sentences.en: I will win the game on more scores than one.
sentences.cn: 为了种种理由我要赢这场比赛.

sentences.en: On a clear night scores of meteors streak the sky.
sentences.cn: 在晴朗的夜晚,好几十颗流星划破长空.

sentences.en: Patten scored his second touchdown of the game.
sentences.cn: 帕顿在比赛中第2次持球触地得分。

sentences.en: Scores of congratulatory telegrams and letters greeted Franklin on his return.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林一回来，就收到了好几十封贺电和贺信。

sentences.en: Scores of people have been hurt in running battles with police.
sentences.cn: 很多人在与警方的冲突中受伤.

sentences.en: Scores of people tried desperately to gatecrash the party.
sentences.cn: 很多不速之客拼命想要挤进这个聚会。

sentences.en: Some scores of people acknowledged that there was a crisis.
sentences.cn: 数十个人都承认存在着一场危机.

sentences.en: The England skipper is haunted by a run of low scores.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队的队长得了一连串的低分。

sentences.en: The groups had historic scores to settle with each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个集团之间有几笔旧账要了结。

sentences.en: There are scores of people there, maybe eighty or more.
sentences.cn: 那里有好多人, 也许有80个或者更多.

sentences.en: There is considerable variability in all the test scores.
sentences.cn: 所有这些考查成绩都有很大变化.

sentences.en: They beat the Giants by a score of 7 to 3.
sentences.cn: 他们以7比3战胜了巨人队。

phrases.tran_cn: 高分；最高分；分数排行榜
宿怨；（wrong done in the past）旧仇

trans.tran_cn: 大量，众多，二十( score的名词复数 )，（游戏或比赛中的）得分，大量，百分数
trans.tran_en: The score in a game is the result of it or the current situation, as indicated by the number of goals, runs, or points obtained by the two teams or players

trans.tran_cn: 得分（score的第三人称单数形式）；刻划
trans.tran_en: In a sport or game, if a player scores a goal or a point, they gain a goal or point
